Title: Relates to the Nesconset Volunteer Firefighter's Benevolent Association
Summary: Relates to the Nesconset Volunteer Exempt Firefighter's Benevolent Association; provides for the purpose of such association, and its use of foreign fire insurance premium taxes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 19 of the laws of 1964, relating to incorporating the Nesconset Volunteer Exempt Firemen's Benevolent Association, and providing for its powers and duties, in relation to the purpose of such association and the use of foreign fire insurance premium taxes
